SEARCH
Package Entities

Class Warenkorb

java.lang.Object
Entities.Warenkorb
public class Warenkorb extends Object
This class represents a shopping cart that contains a list of items from the Eshop selected by the customer. It provides methods to add items to the cart, calculate the total price, remove items, and display the items of the shopping cart.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Warenkorb()
    Constructs an empty shopping cart.

    void
    addItem(WarenkorbArtikel artikel)
    Adds an artikel to the shopping cart.
    double
    calculateTotalPrice()
    Calculates the total price of all items in the shopping cart by iterating through the list and summing up the total price of each item (price per piece * quantity added to the cart).

  • Method Details

    • getWarenkorbListe

      public List<WarenkorbArtikel> getWarenkorbListe()
      Gets the list of items in the shopping cart.
      Returns:
      the list of items in the shopping cart

    • setWarenkorbListe

      public void setWarenkorbListe(List<WarenkorbArtikel> warenkorbListe)
      Sets the list of items in the shopping cart.
      Parameters:
      warenkorbListe - the list of items to set

    • addItem

      public void addItem(WarenkorbArtikel artikel)
      Adds an artikel to the shopping cart.
      Parameters:
      artikel - the artikel to add

    • calculateTotalPrice

      public double calculateTotalPrice()
      Calculates the total price of all items in the shopping cart by iterating through the list and summing up the total price of each item (price per piece * quantity added to the cart).
      Returns:
      the total price of all items in the shopping cart

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem(WarenkorbArtikel artikel)
      Removes an item from the shopping cart.
      Parameters:
      artikel - the item to remove

    • Warenkorbleeren

      public void Warenkorbleeren()
      Clears the shopping cart by removing all items. Prints a message indicating that the shopping cart has been cleared.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the shopping cart. If the shopping cart is empty, it returns a message indicating it is empty. Otherwise, it displays each item in the shopping cart with its details: article name, quantity added to the cart, price per piece, total price for each item, and finally the total price of all items in the cart.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string representation of the shopping cart
